[Web Engine] Modification for ccui.scale9Sprite
data.body:
- Merge ccscale9Sprite and RenderCmd to UIscale9Sprite
- Set an array (_protectedChildren array) to store 9 pieces rather than attach them to _scale9Image
  Refer to UIscale9Sprite.cpp with a little difference.
- Future work: detach textureRenderCmd and Sprite(if attached now) and use 9 renderCmds instead of creating sprites

data.title: CCLabel not rendered with culling enabled
RadioButtonGroup clone will cause program crash
IMG Optimization Task
Add a feature of jumping to a specific item in list tview
data.body:
- Add `jumpToItem()` to list view.
- Refactor the layout related methods of list view to comply with `Layout`'s practice like `Layout::doLayout()`.
  - `requestDoLayout()` and `doLayout()` are overridden and have to use another dirty flag for list view layout other than `Layout::_doLayoutDirty` because `Layout::onEnter()` forces `_doLayoutDirty` to be true always. But, list view should have a way not to do layout in `onEnter()`.

data.title: MoveBy action doesn't work when applied to CCBoneNode in Browser
data.body:
I'm using cocos2d-x 3.8, I have added animation from cocostudio using ccs.load, it displays without issues and plays animation
when I try to use cc.moveBy action, the object doesn't move when I'm running the game in browser, but moves on iOS

data.title: [ci skip][AUTO]: updating luabinding & jsbinding automatically
Restructure CCDownloader implement on iOS and Android don't use libcurl.
Getting bounding box of CocoStudio skeleton is broken for JS in 3.8
data.body:
I tried creating a skeleton based animation in cocostudio and then importing it in JS.
It loads fine, but when trying to get bounding box, it crashes in CCBoneNode.js line 286
I did a quick fix by changing 
    displayRect.setRect(minx, miny, maxx - minx, maxy - miny);
into
    displayRect = type.rect(minx, miny, maxx - minx, maxy - miny);
It works fine now, but I don't understand the engine deep enough to tell if this is a correct fix

data.title: [ci skip] Handle the exceptions when generating documents.
Bitcode 导致编译失败
data.body:
问题：Xcode 7 编译 3.8 ios模拟器 编译失败
详细描述：libcocos2d iOS.a(ftbase.ios8_x86_64.o), building for iOS simulator, but linking in object file built for OSX, for architecture x86_64
我创建了个新的3.8版本的项目直接编译6s模拟器然后出现这个错误，用的是Xcode7 GM Seed版本
我把项目的target Enable Bitcode 设置为No之后 真机上可以编译成功
